ComicInfo.Summary:
A Zero Month crossover issue. A new costumed hero patrols the streets of Star City: one not afraid to spill some blood. This new hero calls himself Manhunter, and saves a woman named Brenna from a gang about to rape her. However, shortly after showing up on the scene, the Manhunter himself is hunted by the Wild Huntsman and his demon dogs. Some of the gang join the fight against the Wild Huntsman, and the Huntsman transforms one of them into a demon dog. It seems that the Huntsman is out hunting murderers, and so long as the gang have not killed, they should be safe. But one of the gang members decides to push the attack, and the gang, with Manhunterâ€™s help, holds off the Huntsman until he is seemingly called away by some other power.
Notes:
"DC Universe 20" one page Zero Hour advertisement featuring the front page of the Daily Planet with the headline "Zero Hour for Earth?" "DC Universe 21" a one page memorial dedicated to Neal Pozner. Artwork of three headshots of Neal by Phil Jimenez.

ComicInfo.Title: Here Comes the Night
